description: Create address service object on PanOS devices

username.description: Username credentials to use for authentication.

ip_address.description: IP address (or hostname) of PAN-OS device being configured.

address_name.description: Human readable name of the address.

address.description: IP address with or without mask, range, or FQDN.

commit.description: Commit configuration to the Firewall if it is changed.

password.description: Password credentials to use for authentication.

type.description: This is the type of the object created.
